title: mark/dash bug
body:
you can't see because of my awesome editing meant for my own amustment. But there is a hilarious bug with mark/dash on aram where you can mark dead bodies allowing you to dash hilariously across the map practically to the enemy fountain. {{summoner:31}}.

but seriously my comp crashed 3 times making this, no my editing is bad.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AJYvyOmvQw&feature=youtu.be
